reviewText: The absolute basics of finger symbol playing for dancers.  A good foundation to build from.  Very clearly explained with a lot of constructive practice sections to help the dancer develop an ear for the rhythms and patterns and build muscle memory.  Not a comprehensive look at  the wide array of rhythms and styles, but a very good place to start.

Nice, detailed, easy to follow instructional video. Teacher is very pleasant and friendly, explains everything in details. Lots of practice drills. Recommended for beginners and intermediate level dancers. Enjoy!
